name: Prodigal (itch) (TKnite)
description:
Prodigal is a narrative driven Point-and-Click adventure game. In which you take control of Maya Lin, the prodigal heir to her father's Corporation, but a disruption in the family will change the roles she will play in her future.  

Explore and Learn about the world through its various denizens!

Play through Mini-games that progress your adventure!

Unravel a mystery that will change the fate of the city!

Game Junkies

Game Designer: Nikita Naidoo

Lead Programmer: Zama Dhlamini

Lead Artist: JC Theron

Narrative Lead: Deshak Ramcharan

Sourced References:

Warped City Asset Pack by robert 20 https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/warped-city-assets-pack-138128#description

Golden UI by Buch https://opengameart.org/content/golden-ui

Dialogue NPC Sprite Artwork in collaboration with Chrissandra Naidoo
